name: The Storyteller (Ardkil)
description:
This game was made for brackeys game jam 2023. I have overscoped a little bit and wasn't able to polish it. Nonethless it is a game. You are a storyteller that shapes the universes to entertain the cosmic entites. Write the story of the hero facing against the evil lord. You can meddle with the ending of the story, and it will begin a whole new sequel. So the end of the story is the beggining of its sequel of your choosing

Music:

Epic Dark Mysterious Music (Copyright and Royalty Free) "Black Fingerprint" - YouTube

🌄 Orchestral Epic Battle Music (For Videos) - "Runic Hills" by Vadim Krakhmal 🇷🇺 - YouTube

Adventure | Royalty Free Medieval Fantasy Music - YouTube

Storytellers desk's Music by JuliusH from Pixabay

It’s A Fight by Aila Scott | https://ailascott.com

Assets I didn't make:

Dungeon Tiles by CardinalZebra (itch.io)

32x32 Tileset by SolaarNoble (itch.io)

Free Swamp 2D Tileset Pixel Art by Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets) (itch.io)
